Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago/Oakley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen and Chicago, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, then resume their normal route on Chicago, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Oakley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #79 79th Reroute at 79th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted near 79th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Jeffery, 76th,  Greenwood, 79th, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 79th/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Hubbard/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Halsted, Grand and Des Plaines due to, street blockage near Hubbard/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Halsted, Grand, Des Plaines and over regular route, due to street blockage near Hubbard/Milwaukee.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
